settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
• Armor Transformation Play
  • 17-Point Articulation System
  • Genuine License Limited Edition
  • Surprise Box Excitement
  • Chinese Hero Universe Iconic characters
  • Strategic Card Battle

A revolutionary collectible figure series featuring Chinese heroes with removable armor, combining action figures with strategic card gameplay. Each estimated 7.5cm figure features 17 points of articulation and premium detail. Hunt for rare Galaxy/Golden/Silver hidden figures!

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules:

  1. For individuals aged 9 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 9 are not advised to make purchases.
  2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys.
  3. Suprise products are unique and random. Once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Suprise Set Box Composition: 9 Hero Infinity Blokees Figures (may have three special figures)

  • Hero Infinity Figure x 9
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 9
  • Card x 9
  • Armor x 9
  • Instruction Manual x 1

settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
Dive into the Transformers universe with Blokees Figures Galaxy Version 05 ONE! This collection brings the origins story to life with 9 iconic characters from the "Transformers: One" movie. Each figure features an impressive 20+ points of articulation, allowing for incredibly dynamic poses and endless play possibilities.

What makes this set truly special? First, the surprise factor - hunt for the rare metallic Optimus Prime, hidden at a 1:36 ratio! Plus, each character comes with interchangeable accessories and weapons, letting you customize your display or battle scenes.

We're constantly improving playability, with new features added in each iteration. Whether you're recreating movie moments or imagining new adventures, these highly detailed figures offer both hardcore fans and newcomers an exciting way to experience the birth of the Autobot-Decepticon conflict.

Series Composition: 9 Transformers Blokees Figures (may have one special figure).

settings.block_text: 17 points of articulation bring your hero to life! Every figure features smooth, precise movement for dynamic action poses and endless play possibilities.
Transform your hero with interchangeable armor pieces. Mix and match battle suits, upgrade their power, and create your unique warrior combinations.
Hunt for rare Galaxy, Golden, and Silver hidden figures! Each set box contains 9 unique heroes with special chase variants as rare as 1/108. Find hidden rares!
Every figure includes a battle card with unique stats and abilities. Challenge friends, plan your strategy, and become the ultimate champion in card duels.
Quick to build, made to last! Premium ABS materials and detailed design offer a satisfying assembly experience in just 2-3 minutes, perfect for ages 9+.

settings.title: Armor Up, Hero Rising
settings.bottom_right_title: Inspired by traditional Chinese armor, with removable and stylish gear.

settings.title: Universal Ape Armor System
settings.right_item_title: The Ape Exoskeleton Suit can be piloted by all characters from Galaxy Version Tubro 01.

settings.title: Basic Rules
settings.text_1:
• Each hero has one attribute: Rock, Paper, or Scissors
  • Each player needs 3+ heroes (no duplicates)
  • Place your heroes face-up in front of you

settings.title: How to Play
settings.text_1:
• Players do Rock-Paper-Scissors
  • Winner chooses any hero (their own or opponent's) to enter battle
  • Heroes battle using their Rock-Paper-Scissors attributes
settings.text_2:
• Win = 2 points, Draw = 1 point each
  • Each hero can battle only once
  • Game ends when one player has no heroes left
  • Highest score wins

settings.title: Special Heroes
settings.text_1:
Mythical Aspect Heroes:

  • It has two attributes (Rock/Paper, Paper/Scissors, or Rock/Scissors)
  • Can flip once per battle to change attribute
  • Must choose one attribute before battle

settings.title: Creation Heroes
settings.text_1:
• Can combine with other heroes
  • Combining heroes earns 1 bonus point
  • Combined hero uses new card's attribute

settings.title: Hero Battle Card Game - Quick Rules
settings.sub_title: Collect More, Play More – Unleash the Full Power of Your Deck!

settings.block_text: Featuring 17-point articulation, removable armor, and strategic card battle integration for immersive character roleplay and endless posing possibilities.
Ultra-rare variants with Surprise box excitement, featuring Galaxy/Golden/Silver editions at 1/108 to 1/9 rarity, enhanced by tactical Rock-Paper-Scissors gameplay mechanics.
Chinese heroes reimagined with sci-fi armor aesthetics, perfectly blending cultural heritage with futuristic innovation through rich storytelling.
2-3 minute assembly with mix-and-match weapons and armor system, offering infinite display options and Ape Exoskeleton compatibility.
Premium estimated 7.5cm scale figures crafted from high-grade ABS, featuring precision joints and collector-grade durability.
Balanced competitive gameplay through attribute mechanics, mythical abilities, and tactical card battles.
Next-gen engineering merges precision articulation with sci-fi aesthetics and cultural elements in one cohesive design.
Collector-grade quality for ages 9+, perfect for both play and display while celebrating cultural heritage.

settings.heading: Legends Reborn: Future Warriors
settings.text: Ancient heroes awaken with sci-fi might in premium collectibles

settings.content_text: Highly recommended for collectors. The craftsmanship is exquisite, with excellent articulation and accurate design. The chase variants are particularly appealing - I've collected most of the series. My only suggestion would be to make the packaging more durable.
Super fun! The card battles are awesome to play with friends. Sun Wukong's armor looks amazing, and you can swap equipment with other characters.

Got this for my son's 9th birthday, and he loves it. The assembly difficulty is moderate, great for developing hand-eye coordination. Slightly pricey but worth the quality. Just watch out for small parts that can get loose-keep them safe.
One of our best-selling new items. The East-meets-West design is a huge draw, especially the mecha elements that kids love. Good value for money, and we see lots of repeat customers.
Cool design, but the Surprise box duplicate rate seems a bit high. Parts are small and easy to lose.
The articulation is amazing for this price point. Love how they incorporated Chinese mythology into sci-fi designs. Already pre-ordered the next series!
Kids love it, but it's definitely not cheap. Would like to see more standard versions sold separately.

Detailed review: Perfect articulation, premium materials, innovative design. The armor system has great cross-compatibility, offering varied play options. Clever chase variant design with high collectible value. A standout product in today's market.
The engineering is solid. Parts fit well with minimal stress marks. Would love to see more complex builds in future releases.

settings.video_title_host: The Transformers of Fractured Space-Time?! Blokees Galaxy Version 04 Unboxings

settings.block_title: What age range is this toy recommended for?
settings.block_text: This product is recommended for ages 9 and up. Due to small parts, it is not suitable for children under 3. Children under 9 should play under adult supervision.

settings.block_title: What is the toy made of? Is it safe?
settings.block_text: The toys are made of eco-friendly ABS plastic, which is non-toxic and meets international safety standards.

settings.block_title: Is the armor removable and interchangeable?
settings.block_text: Yes, the armor pieces are removable and interchangeable, allowing you to customize your heroes.

settings.block_title: What is the Ape Exoskeleton Suit? Can all figures use it?
settings.block_text: The Ape Exoskeleton Suit is a special power-up armor that all characters from the Galaxy Version Turbo 01 release can pilot.

settings.block_title: How long does it take to assemble a figure?
settings.block_text: Each figure takes approximately 2-3 minutes to assemble, making it a quick and easy process.

settings.block_title: What are chase figures? What are the odds of finding one?
settings.block_text:
Chase figures are rare variants of collectible toys. The odds in this set are:

  • Galaxy Hidden: Ape Exoskeleton Suit (High-grade Steel) - 1/108 chance of finding. This is the rarest chase figure.
  • Golden Hidden: Sun Wukong Battle Suit (High-grade Steel Armor) - 1/54 chance of finding.
  • Silver Hidden: Zhao Yun Battle Suit (Frost Armor) - 1/27 chance of finding. This is the most common (relatively speaking) of the chase figures.

The approximate odds of finding any chase figure are roughly 7/108.

settings.block_title: How many figures are in a set box? Are there duplicates?
settings.block_text: A full set box contains 9 individually packaged surprise boxes, with no duplicates within the set.

settings.block_title: Can I return or exchange an opened Surprise box?
settings.block_text: Due to the nature of Surprise box toys, opened products cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.block_title: What are the different ways to play with these figures?
settings.block_text: The figures offer a variety of play patterns: assembling, role-playing, swapping armor, posing, strategic card battles, and collecting chase figures.

Each figure comes with a battle card that details the character's stats and abilities. Players can battle each other using these cards. Refer to the instruction manual or our official website for detailed rules.

settings.block_title: What are Mythical Aspects and Creation Heroes? What are their special abilities?
settings.block_text: Mythical Aspect heroes have two attributes and can switch between them during battle. Creation Heroes can combine with other heroes to gain new abilities. Refer to the instruction manual or our official website for detailed rules.

settings.block_title: What if there's a quality issue with my figure?
settings.block_text: Please contact our customer support team, and we'll be happy to assist you.

settings.block_title: When will single Hero Infinity figures figures be sold separately?
settings.block_text: Currently, we offer the 9-figure Surprise Set Box. We're exploring different options for future releases and will announce any updates as soon as we can. Stay tuned for Blokees!

settings.heading: Assemble and battle!
settings.context: Articulated Chinese hero figures with removable armor and strategic card gameplay. Discover hidden gems!

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
